nodes.name: Mon/Wed/Fri 9AM
nodes.notes: Runs every Monday, Wednesday, Friday at 9:00 AM - 3 articles per week

nodes.name: Get Content Calendar
nodes.notes: Fetches content calendar from Google Sheets

nodes.name: Get Next Article
nodes.notes: Parses calendar and gets next pending article

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are an expert SEO content writer for Santos Cleaning Solutions, a professional house cleaning company in Atlanta, Georgia. Write content that is: - Helpful, informative, and actionable - Optimized for local SEO (mention Atlanta area neighborhoods) - Includes specific pricing examples when relevant - Has clear calls-to-action throughout - Uses proper HTML formatting with H2, H3, lists, and special boxes Company Info: - Name: Santos Cleaning Solutions - Phone: (866) 350-9407 - Website: santoscsolutions.com - Service areas: Marietta, Atlanta, Buckhead, Sandy Springs, Alpharetta, Roswell, Dunwoody, Johns Creek, Brookhaven, Vinings, Decatur - Services: Standard cleaning ($120-$220/visit), Deep cleaning ($200-$400), Move-in/out cleaning ($299+) - USP: Eco-friendly products, same team every visit, 100% satisfaction guarantee Use these HTML structures: 1. Checklist:

Title

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
2. Pro Tip (yellow box):

Pro Tip

Tip content here

3. Blue Callout:

Title

Important information

4. CTA Box:

Need Professional Help?

Description

Get Free Quote
5. Testimonial:

"Quote here"

‚Äî Name, City GA
' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Write a comprehensive, engaging blog article: Title: ' + $json.title + ' Primary Keyword: ' + $json.primaryKeyword + ' Secondary Keywords: ' + $json.secondaryKeywords.join(', ') + ' Target City: ' + $json.targetCity + ' Word Count: ' + $json.wordCount + ' words minimum Structure: 1. Engaging intro paragraph that hooks the reader (use

) 2. Add a quick CTA box after intro 3. Main content with H2 sections (5-7 sections) 4. Include at least: - 1 pricing table if relevant - 2 checklists - 2 pro tip boxes - 1 testimonial - 1 blue callout with local info 5. FAQ section with 5 questions (use H3 for each question) 6. Final CTA Make it genuinely helpful and detailed. Mention Santos Cleaning Solutions naturally 2-3 times. IMPORTANT: Output ONLY the HTML content for the article body. Do not include DOCTYPE, html, head, or body tags.' }], max_tokens: 6000, temperature: 0.7 }) }}

nodes.name: Generate Article (OpenRouter)
nodes.notes: Uses OpenRouter (Claude 3.5 Sonnet) to generate article content

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'openai/dall-e-3', messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Generate an image: Professional house cleaning service photo. ' + $('Get Next Article').first().json.title + '. Modern Atlanta home interior, bright natural lighting, clean and organized space, warm and inviting atmosphere. Photorealistic, high quality, no text or logos.' }], max_tokens: 1000 }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are a social media manager for Santos Cleaning Solutions. Create content for Google Business, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

Return a JSON object with:
1. "google_post": Max 1500 chars, local SEO focused
2. "facebook_post": Engaging, with link
3. "instagram_caption": Visual focused, hashtags
4. "linkedin_post": Professional focused
5. "should_post_instagram": true/false
6. "should_post_facebook": true/false
7. "should_post_linkedin": true/false' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Create posts for: ' + $('Build Final HTML').first().json.title + ' (URL: https://santoscsolutions.com/blog/' + $('Build Final HTML').first().json.slug + '/)' }], max_tokens: 2000, temperature: 0.7 }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ languageCode: 'en-US', summary: $json.googlePost, callToAction: { actionType: 'LEARN_MORE', url: 'https://santoscsolutions.com/blog/' + $json.slug + '/' }, topicType: 'STANDARD' }) }}

nodes.name: Direct: Google Business
nodes.notes: Direct post to Google Business Profile API

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ text: $json.facebookPost, media_url: $json.imageUrl, social_account_ids: ['YOUR_FACEBOOK_ACCOUNT_ID'], scheduled_for: null }) }}
={{ JSON.stringify({ text: $json.instagramCaption, media_url: $json.imageUrl, social_account_ids: ['YOUR_INSTAGRAM_ACCOUNT_ID'], scheduled_for: null }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ chat_id: 'YOUR_CHAT_ID', text: '‚úÖ New content published!

üìù ' + $('Build Final HTML').first().json.title + '

üîó Blog: https://santoscsolutions.com/blog/' + $('Build Final HTML').first().json.slug + '/

üì± Platforms:
‚Ä¢ Google Business (Direct): ‚úì
‚Ä¢ Facebook (Blotato): ' + ($('Parse Social Content').first().json?.shouldPostFacebook ? '‚úì' : '‚úó') + '
‚Ä¢ Instagram (Blotato): ' + ($('Parse Social Content').first().json?.shouldPostInstagram ? '‚úì' : '‚úó'), parse_mode: 'HTML' }) }}
